Body:
kSE = gpflow.kernels.SquaredExponential(lengthscales=lengthscales, variance
    =variance)
kRQ = gpflow.kernels.RationalQuadratic(lengthscales=lengthscales, variance=
    variance, alpha=100000000.0)
rng = np.random.RandomState(1)
X = rng.randn(6, 1).astype(default_float())
gram_matrix_SE = kSE(X)
gram_matrix_RQ = kRQ(X)
assert_allclose(gram_matrix_SE, gram_matrix_RQ)
pytest.mark.parametrize('variance, lengthscales', [[2.3, 1.4]])
